azurerm_network_interface_nat_rule_assoc.description: Manages the association between a Network Interface and a Load Balancer's NAT Rule.

network_interface_id.description: The ID of the Network Interface. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ip_configuration_name.description: The Name of the IP Configuration within the Network Interface which should be connected to the NAT Rule. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

nat_rule_id.description: The ID of the Load Balancer NAT Rule which this Network Interface which should be connected to. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The (Terraform specific) ID of the Association between the Network Interface and the Load Balancers NAT Rule.

create.description: Used when creating the association between the Network Interface and the Load Balancers NAT Rule.

update.description: Used when updating the association between the Network Interface and the Load Balancers NAT Rule.

read.description: Used when retrieving the association between the Network Interface and the Load Balancers NAT Rule.

delete.description: Used when deleting the association between the Network Interface and the Load Balancers NAT Rule.
